question: I am the first alien Ben transformed into in Alien Force. I control fire and plants, and I can regenerate my body. Who am I?
I am a small alien made of silicon. I can scream sonic waves and create endless clones of myself. Who am I?
I am a Vaxasaurian. I possess immense strength and can grow up to 60 feet tall to crush my enemies. Who am I?
I can fly at supersonic speeds in the air and water, and I shoot neuroshock blasts from my eyes and tail. Who am I?
I am a moth-like alien who can phase through solid matter and freeze enemies with my breath. Who am I?
I am a crystal guardian who can absorb energy attacks and fire them back as multi-colored blasts. Who am I?
I am a hyper-intelligent crab. I can solve complex physics equations and shoot electricity from my brain. Who am I?
I have four arms and a tail, and I act like a monkey. I can shoot strong webs from my tail. Who am I?
I am a polymorph made of living slime. I need my anti-gravity projector to stand up and move. Who am I?
I am a Celestialsapien. I can do anything, but I must first get my two internal personalities to agree. Who am I?
I control magnetic fields and can regenerate my body even if I am blown to pieces. Who am I?
Let me tell you something! I am an Appoplexian who loves to wrestle and gets angry at everything! Who am I?
I am half-drone, half-human, created to fight the swarm. I can shrink to microscopic sizes. Who am I?
I returned in Alien Force with the Omnitrix symbol on my chest. I still roll into a ball to attack. Who am I?
I returned to fight the Highbreed invasion. I am the tallest alien Ben has. Who am I?
I am the 'Murk' subspecies of Upchuck. I have darker skin than the classic Perk version. Who am I?
When Chromastone was destroyed by Vilgax, I emerged from the shards to defeat him. Who am I?
I tried to take over Ben's body again in Alien Force. I am the Ectonurite form. Who am I?
I was the supreme commander of the invasion until Ben repaired my DNA and cured my species. Who am I?
I was Ben's favorite alien at age 11, but Malware destroyed me, removing me from the Omnitrix. Who am I?
I am not an alien, but a Galvan trapped in a negative copy of Ben's human form. I love chili fries. Who am I?
